sentence.Network_en: The ornamental ironwork lends a touch of elegance to the house.
sentence.Network_cn: 铁艺饰件为房子略添雅致.

sentence.Network_en: When he was first admitted into the construction team, he learned ironwork.
sentence.Network_cn: 他刚进施工队的时候, 最先学习的是铁活.

sentence.Network_en: The interior is also very impressive , with Gothic vaulted ceilings and ironwork.
sentence.Network_cn: 我想这是我见过的最棒的火车站,更像一座皇宫.

entry.def: Iron objects or structures are referred to as ironwork .
